Translations.Text: Kayamata javala ali ani candra dubhangala
He jevha ekhada mojija (camatkara) pahatata, tevha tonda phiravitata, ani mhanatata hi tara pahilyapasuna calata aleli jadu ahe
Ani tyanni khote tharavile va apalya iccha akanksance anusarana kele. Ani pratyeka karya niscita velevaraca nirdharita ahe
Nihsansaya, tyacyajavala tya varta ye'una pohacalya aheta, jyata tambi - takidi (ci sikavana) aheta
Ani purna bud'dhikausalyaci gosta ahe, parantu ya bhayabhita karanarya gostinnihi kahi labha dila nahi
(Tevha, he paigambara!) Tumhi tyancyakaduna tonda phirava, jya divasi eka pukaranara apriya gostikade bolavila
He jhukalelya netranni kabarimadhuna asa prakare uthuna ubhe rahatila ki janu itastatah pasaralela tola thava
Pukaranaryakade dhavata jata asatila ani kaphira mhanatila ki ha divasa tara motha kathina ahe
Tyancyapurvi nuhacya janasamuhanehi amacya dasala khote tharavile hote. Ani veda darsavuna jhidakarale hote
Tevha tyane apalya palanakartyajavala du'a (prarthana) keli ki mi tavadita sapadalelo ahe. Tu majhi madata kara
Tevha amhi akasace daravaje musaladhara pavasane ughadale
Ani jaminituna jhare pravahita kele, tevha tya karyasathi je bhagyata lihile gele hote, (doghehi) pani ekatrita jhale
Ani amhi tyala asa nauketa cadhavile, ji takte ani mekha asaleli hoti
Ji amacya dolyansamora calata hoti. Ha mobadala tyacyatarphe, jyaca inkara kela gela hota
Ani nihsansaya, amhi ya ghatanela nisani banavuna baki rakhale tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Tevha (sanga) kasa hota majha prakopa ani majhi bhayapurna tambi
Ani nihsansaya, amhi kura'anala samajanyakarita sope kele ahe1 tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Adacya janasamuhanehi khote tharavile tevha kasa hota majha azaba ani majhi bhayapurna tambi
Amhi tyancyavara satata vegane vahanari hava (vadali vara) eka satatacya asubha divasi pathavili
Ji lokanna ucaluna apatata hoti, janu mulasakata ukhadalele khajurice vrksa aheta
Tevha kasa hota majha prakopa ani majhe bhayabhita karane
Ani nihsansaya, amhi kura'ananala bodhapraptikarita sope kele ahe tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Samudacya janasamuhane (hi) khabaradara karanaryanna khote tharavile
Ani mhanale ki, kaya amacyapaikica eka manasace amhi anusarana karu lagave? Maga tara amhi avasya va'itapanata ani vedepanata padalele asu
Kaya amha sarvammadhuna phakta tyacyavaraca vahayi (prakasana) avatarita keli geli? Tevha to khotarada, ghamendi ahe
Ata sarva januna ghetila ki udya kona khotarada va ghamendi hota
Nihsansaya, amhi tyancya kasotikarita sandani pathavu tevha (he svaleha!) Tumhi tyanci pratiksa kara ani dhira sanyama rakha
Ani tyanna khabara dya ki panyaci tyacyata vatani ahe. Pratyeka apalya palivara hajara ho'ila
Tevha tyanni apalya sathidarala bolavile, jyane (sandanivara) halla kela ani (ticya) ghodanasa kapuna takalya
Tevha kasa hota majha azaba ani majhe bhayabhita karane
Amhi tyancyavara eka bhayankara citkara pathavila tevha te ase jhale, janu kumpana banavinaryaci tudavileli ghasa (cara)
Ani amhi bodhapraptikarita kura'anala sope kele ahe tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Lutacya janasamuhane dekhila khabaradara karanaryanna khote tharavile
Nihsansaya, amhi tyancyavara dagadanca varsava karanari hava pathavili, luta (alai.) Yancya kutumbiyankherija, tyanna pratahkali amhi suraksa (mukti) pradana keli
Apalya krpene pratyeka krtajnasila (dasa) la amhi asa prakare mobadala deto
Nihsansaya, tya (luta) ne tyanna amacya pakadice bhaya dakhavile hote, parantu tyanni bhaya dakhavinaryambabata sanka dharuna vada ghatala
Ani luta (alai.) Yanna tyancya atithincya sandarbhata phusa lavu icchile tevha amhi tyance dole andhale kele (ani sangitale), majhya siksa - yataneci va bhayapurna tambici godi cakha
Ani niscita ahe ki tyanna sakalica eka thikani dharanarya nirdharita azaba (isasikse) ne nasta karuna takale
Tevha majhya prakopaca ani majhya tambica svada cakha
Ani nihsansaya, amhi kura'anala bodha ani upadesakarita sope kele ahe. Tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Ani phira'aunacya lokanjavalahi khabaradara karanare ale
Tyanni amacya sarva nisanyanna khote tharavile tevha amhi tyanna mothya jabaradasta ani saktisali pakadanaryapramane pakadale
(He makkacya lokanno!) Kaya tumacya samudayatila kaphira tya samudayancya kaphirampeksa srestha aheta ki tumacyasathi purvicya granthammadhye sutaka lihileli ahe
Kaya he ase mhanatata ki amhi varcasvasali honare loka ahota
Lavakaraca ha samuha parabhuta kela ja'ila ani patha dakhavuna pala kadhila
Kimbahuna kayamataci vela, tyancya vayadyaci vela ahe ani kayamata atisaya kathina ani mothi katu baba ahe
Nihsansaya, aparadhi loka margabhrastateta ani yataneta aheta
Jya divasi te tondaghasi paduna agita pharaphatata nele jatila (ani tyanna sangitale ja'ila) jahannamacya agicya sparsaci godi cakha
Nihsansaya, amhi pratyeka gosta eka (nirdharita) anumanavara nirmana keli ahe
Ani amaca adesa kevala ekada (ca eka sabda) ca asato, jase papanice lavane
Ani amhi tumacyasarakhya kityekanna nasta karuna takale ahe, tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Ani je je (karma) tyanni kele ahe te sarva karmapatrata lihilele ahe
(Asa prakare) pratyeka lahana mothi gosta lihileli ahe
Nihsansaya, allahace bhaya rakhanare loka jannata ani pravahammadhye asatila
Sacoti va pratisthecya sthani samarthyasali malaka (allaha) javala
